lines.text: Maybe... those robes are some sort of fancy compression suit that regulates his breathing.
It... makes it so that you can't measure his pulse, and his chest doesn't rise and fall with-
No, I mean, how's that work? And how's it hidden to seem like an ordinary robe?
Which they can't do, besides the two spells each they have.
They, uh, bought it? From a different wizard?
C'mon, now. You can solve this with the evidence we actually have.
